figure_1.title: Fig 1.
figure_1.caption: EXACTâ€™s user interface: A. Screenshot of trial result reported at ClinicalTrials.gov; B. Screenshot of six steps through which the user specifies the items to be downloaded (Appendix 2 provides a user manual); C. Screenshot of data extracted in Excel format.

figure_2.title: Fig 2.
figure_2.caption: Flowchart for selection of meta-analyses repeated using data manually extracted from original articles and data extracted by EXACT from ClinicalTrials.gov.

claims.sentence: Fig 1 shows the user interface, and Appendix 2 is a user manual for EXACT.

Fig 2 describes the article selection, Table 1 describes the articles selected [Qu et al., 2016,(18) six trials; Abdel-Rahman et al., 2016,(19) four trials; and Li et al., 2016,(20) five trials], and Appendix 4 describes the reasons for excluding other systematic review articles.
